meanings.sent1: The elephant was gigantesque compared to the tiny mouse.
meanings.sent2: The gigantesque mountain loomed in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The gigantesque cake was too big for the tiny table.
meanings.sent4: Her gigantesque smile lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The gigantesque waves crashed against the shore with immense power.

meanings.sent1: The gigantesque tree provided shade for the whole park.
meanings.sent2: The gigantesque building towered over the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The gigantesque pumpkin won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent4: His gigantesque appetite surprised everyone at the dinner table.
meanings.sent5: The gigantesque storm clouds darkened the sky before the rain.
